metadata.Title: CVE-2022-48522 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low.
metadata.Description:
In Perl 5.34.0, function S_find_uninit_var in sv.c has a stack-based crash that can lead to remote code execution or local privilege escalation.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-48522` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libperl5.36 - 5.36.0-7
perl - 5.36.0-7
perl-base - 5.36.0-7
perl-debug - 5.36.0-7
perl-modules-5.36 - 5.36.0-7
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This is just an infinite recursion when trying to print a warning message causing the process to run out of stack space, this has a negligible security impact

criterions.comment: perl package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.36.0-7').
